Topic.Title: Quest Desktop Player Currently Playing  24 bit 192 kHz FLAC

Posts.EditableText:
So, I was just playing around with `play sound` in code view, and I decided to be silly and drop a FLAC file from HDTracks in the game folder and put `play sound ("01-Speak To Me.flac", false, false)`...

...and it is now playing some HD Pink Floyd!

Who'd a thunk it?
Posts.HTML:
